rukus.text: Ara allah yadi manusake pakara'o karatena tadera an'yayacaranera jan'ye tabe tini era upare kono jibajantuke'i rakhatena na, kintu tini tadera abakasa diye thakena ekati nirdistakala paryanta, sejan'ye yakhana tadera miyada ese yaya takhana tara ghantakhanekera jan'ye'o pichiye dite pare na, ara egiye'o anate pare na.

Ara tara allahâ€Œte aropa kare ya tara apachanda kare, ara tadera jihaba mithyakatha racana kare ye bhala bisayabastu tadera jan'ye'i. Sandeha ne'i ye tadera jan'ya rayeche aguna, ara nihsandeha tara acire'i parityakta habe.

Allahâ€Œra kasama! Amara niscaya'i tomara age jatigulora kache rasula pathiyechilama, kintu sayatana tadera kriyakalapa tadera kache cittakarsaka karechila; sejan'ye se aja tadera murabbi, ara tadera jan'ya rayeche marmantuda sasti.

Ara tomara kache amara e'i grantha patha'i ni e'ijan'ya chara ye tumi tadera kache suspastabhabe barnana karabe ye-bisaye tara matabheda kare, ara ekati pathanirdesa o karuna se'i lokadera jan'ya yara bisbasa kare.
Ara allah akasa theke pani barsana karena, ara ta diye tini prthibike jibanta karena tara mrtyura pare. Nihsandeha ete yathartha nidarsana rayeche se'i lokadera jan'ya yara sone.
